content:
Hi Team,

Can someone help me to understand the use case / requirement of Plan Net Endpoint profile in Provider Directory context? Based on that I can start finding the mandated data elements availability.

@Lloyd McKenzie , @Grahame Grieve - Requesting your assistance on this.

Regards,
Aritra
Are you talking about Da Vinci Plan NET? Have you read the IG?

Lloyd McKenzie said:

Are you talking about Da Vinci Plan NET? Have you read the IG?

Yes Lloyd, I am referring the Da Vinci Plan Net IG only - http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-pdex-plan-net/index.html

I just wanted to understand the use case of an endpoint profile for Provider Directory context. It would be really helpful if you can guide me on this.

Regards,
Aritra
There's actually a stream devoted to that specific IG. You can find it here: https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/229922-Da.2BVinci.2BPDex.2BPlan-Net
